text: This is a list of all transactions occurring in the 1996-97 NBA season. ==Events== If you want to see the transaction events (from July 1, 1996 to June 27, 1997), see the links below ==External links== *Basketball.RealGM.com *Basketball-Reference.com ==References== Transactions 1996-97
title: List of 1996–97 NBA season transactions
